movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption through acts of decency.

movies.title: Inception
movies.synopsis: A thief uses dream-sharing technology to plant an idea in a CEO's mind.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.synopsis: A poor family infiltrates a wealthy household, exposing class divides.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.synopsis: Batman faces the Joker in a battle for Gotham's soul.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.synopsis: Interconnected stories of crime and redemption in Los Angeles.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.synopsis: A tragic love story aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.synopsis: A theme park with cloned dinosaurs turns deadly.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.synopsis: The Avengers fight to reverse Thanos' snap and restore the universe.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.synopsis: A hacker discovers humanity is trapped in a simulated reality.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.synopsis: A man with a low IQ witnesses and influences key historical events.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.synopsis: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge as a gladiator.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.synopsis: Astronauts travel through a wormhole to save humanity.
